forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
